languages.text: "Стыдно, капитан. Долг офицера — быть опорой для Лорд-капитана, а не наоборот. Если это бремя вас тяготит, то впору задуматься об отставке. Говорю без обиняков, как ветеран ветерану". {n}За безжалостными словами сенешаля ютится толика сочувствия.{/n}

"Shame on you, Captain. An officer's duty is to be a support to the Lord Captain, not the other way around. If that burden is too great for you, you should consider resigning. I speak plainly, veteran to veteran." {n}A modicum of sympathy is buried deep within the Seneschal's ruthless words.{/n}

"Shame on you, Captain. An officer's duty is to be a support to the Lord Captain, not the other way around. If that burden is too great for you, you should consider resigning. I speak plainly, veteran to veteran." {n}A modicum of sympathy is buried deep within the Seneschal's ruthless words.{/n}

languages.text: «Debería darle vergüenza, capitán. Es deber de un oficial servir de apoyo a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, y no al revés. Si tan grande le resulta el puesto, considere dimitir. Se lo digo sin tapujos, de veterano a veterano». {n}Las palabras sin escrúpulos del Senescal esconden un ápice de empatía.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shame on you, Captain. An officer's duty is to be a support to the Lord Captain, not the other way around. If that burden is too great for you, you should consider resigning. I speak plainly, veteran to veteran." {n}A modicum of sympathy is buried deep within the Seneschal's ruthless words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Debería darle vergüenza, capitán. Es deber de un oficial servir de apoyo a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, y no al revés. Si tan grande le resulta el puesto, considere dimitir. Se lo digo sin tapujos, de veterano a veterano». {n}Las palabras sin escrúpulos del Senescal esconden un ápice de empatía.{/n}

languages.text: 「恥を知ってください、中隊長。士官の仕事はロード・キャプテンをサポートすることであって、その逆であってはなりません。その負担が大きすぎるなら、辞任を考えるべきです。ベテランからベテランへの率直な意見だと思ってください」{n}家令長の冷酷な言葉の奥底には、ささやかな同情が埋もれている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shame on you, Captain. An officer's duty is to be a support to the Lord Captain, not the other way around. If that burden is too great for you, you should consider resigning. I speak plainly, veteran to veteran." {n}A modicum of sympathy is buried deep within the Seneschal's ruthless words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「恥を知ってください、中隊長。士官の仕事はロード・キャプテンをサポートすることであって、その逆であってはなりません。その負担が大きすぎるなら、辞任を考えるべきです。ベテランからベテランへの率直な意見だと思ってください」{n}家令長の冷酷な言葉の奥底には、ささやかな同情が埋もれている。{/n}

languages.text: “这真是太可耻了，上尉。身为军官，你的职责是协助舰长大人，不是让舰长大人来协助你。如果你无法承受这样的负担，那你应该考虑辞职。我这是站在另一位老兵的立场上，对你实话实说。”{n}阿贝拉德看似冷酷的话语之中，深埋着一丝同情之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shame on you, Captain. An officer's duty is to be a support to the Lord Captain, not the other way around. If that burden is too great for you, you should consider resigning. I speak plainly, veteran to veteran." {n}A modicum of sympathy is buried deep within the Seneschal's ruthless words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这真是太可耻了，上尉。身为军官，你的职责是协助舰长大人，不是让舰长大人来协助你。如果你无法承受这样的负担，那你应该考虑辞职。我这是站在另一位老兵的立场上，对你实话实说。”{n}阿贝拉德看似冷酷的话语之中，深埋着一丝同情之意。{/n}

languages.text: "Schämt Euch, Captain. Ein Offizier hat die Pflicht, den Lord Captain zu unterstützen, nicht umgekehrt. Falls Euch diese Bürde zu groß ist, solltet Ihr Euren Hut nehmen. Ich sage das ganz offen von Veteran zu Veteran." {n}Ein Hauch von Sympathie schwingt in den harten Worten des Truchsess mit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shame on you, Captain. An officer's duty is to be a support to the Lord Captain, not the other way around. If that burden is too great for you, you should consider resigning. I speak plainly, veteran to veteran." {n}A modicum of sympathy is buried deep within the Seneschal's ruthless words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Schämt Euch, Captain. Ein Offizier hat die Pflicht, den Lord Captain zu unterstützen, nicht umgekehrt. Falls Euch diese Bürde zu groß ist, solltet Ihr Euren Hut nehmen. Ich sage das ganz offen von Veteran zu Veteran." {n}Ein Hauch von Sympathie schwingt in den harten Worten des Truchsess mit.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous devriez avoir honte, capitaine. Un officier se doit de soutenir {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}… et pas l'inverse. Si ce fardeau est trop lourd à porter pour vous, vous feriez mieux de démissionner. Je ne fais que vous dire le fond de ma pensée, de vétéran à vétéran. » {n}Bien que ses paroles puissent sembler impitoyables, vous décelez dans la voix du sénéchal une once d'empathie.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shame on you, Captain. An officer's duty is to be a support to the Lord Captain, not the other way around. If that burden is too great for you, you should consider resigning. I speak plainly, veteran to veteran." {n}A modicum of sympathy is buried deep within the Seneschal's ruthless words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous devriez avoir honte, capitaine. Un officier se doit de soutenir {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}… et pas l'inverse. Si ce fardeau est trop lourd à porter pour vous, vous feriez mieux de démissionner. Je ne fais que vous dire le fond de ma pensée, de vétéran à vétéran. » {n}Bien que ses paroles puissent sembler impitoyables, vous décelez dans la voix du sénéchal une once d'empathie.{/n}

languages.text: "Yazıklar olsun Kaptan. Bir subayın vazifesi, Lord Kaptan'a destek olmaktır. Tam tersi söz konusu olamaz. Eğer ki bu yük, kaldıramayacağın kadar ağırsa istifa etmeyi düşünebilirsin. İkimiz de kıdemliyiz, bu yüzden açıkça konuşuyorum." {n}Seneşal'in acımasız sözlerinin derinliklerinde bir nebze de olsa sempati duygusu gömülü.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Shame on you, Captain. An officer's duty is to be a support to the Lord Captain, not the other way around. If that burden is too great for you, you should consider resigning. I speak plainly, veteran to veteran." {n}A modicum of sympathy is buried deep within the Seneschal's ruthless words.{/n}
